headline.print_headline: Nielsen Poll: Film Reviews Still Influential
headline.main: Nielsen Poll: Film Reviews Still Influential

docs.snippet: Social media has made inroads into shaping moviegoers' choices at the multiplex, but a new poll finds that an overwhelming majority of moviegoers still count on movie reviews....

headline.main: White House, Treasury Officials to Appear at SEC Cyber Security Event

headline.print_headline: NYC Jail Guard Charged in Death of Inmate Who Ate Disinfectant
headline.main: NYC Jail Guard Charged in Death of Inmate Who Ate Disinfectant

docs.snippet: A former senior guard at New York City's main jail complex was arrested on Monday on a federal charge that he deprived a mentally ill inmate of medical aid after he swallowed a corrosive disinfectant....

headline.print_headline: Colorado Court Says Lawyers Can Advise Pot Clients

headline.print_headline: Prosecutor: Smoking Caused NJ Fire That Killed 4
headline.main: Prosecutor: Smoking Caused NJ Fire That Killed 4

docs.snippet: A cigarette discarded in a stuffed chair touched off a fire that killed four people at a New Jersey shore motel last week, authorities said Monday....

headline.print_headline: Morgan Stanley Pays Fine After Index Hedge Topped Soymeal Limits
headline.main: Morgan Stanley Pays Fine After Index Hedge Topped Soymeal Limits

docs.snippet: Morgan Stanley has agreed to pay $200,000 to settle civil charges it exceeded speculative position limits in soybean meal futures for two days while attempting to hedge a commodity index investment, U.S. regulators said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Morgan Stanley has agreed to pay $200,000 to settle civil charges it exceeded speculative position limits in soybean meal futures for two days while attempting to hedge a commodity index investment, U.S. regulators said on Monday.
